caption.p: Identification of DEGs in four TNBC microarray datasets from GEO.

Notes: ( Aâ€“ D) Volcano plots of differential expression analysis for GSE27447, GSE39004, GSE43358 and GSE45827. ( E) Upset plot of DEGs overlapped in the four datasets. ( F) Expression heatmap of top 10 up- and down-regulated genes.
Abbreviations: TNBC, triple negative breast cancer; GEO, Genome Expression Omnibus; DEGs, differentially expressed genes.
